TITLE: Basic ScribeLog Usage in Python
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to configure ScribeLog, log messages with and without timestamps, and retrieve the current log file path.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rosebudsystems/scribelog/blob/main/README_es.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from ScribeLog import ConfigLog, Log, GetPathLogin

# Configurar el archivo de registro
ConfigLog("/ruta/a/tuarchivo.log")

# Registrar un mensaje con marca de tiempo
Log("Este es un mensaje de prueba.")

# Registrar un mensaje sin marca de tiempo
Log("Otro mensaje de prueba.", time=False)

# Recuperar la ruta actual del archivo de registro
print(GetPathLogin())
```

TITLE: Basic ScribeLog Usage Example
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates core functionality including configuring log file path, writing messages with and without timestamps, and retrieving the current log path.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rosebudsystems/scribelog/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from ScribeLog import ConfigLog, Log, GetPathLogin

# Configure the log file
ConfigLog("/path/to/yourfile.log")

# Log a message with timestamp
Log("This is a test message.")

# Log a message without timestamp
Log("Another test message.", time=False)

# Retrieve the current log file path
print(GetPathLogin())
```

TITLE: ScribeLog Error Handling Example
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to handle FileError exceptions that may occur when configuring an invalid log file path.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rosebudsystems/scribelog/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from ScribeLog import ConfigLog, FileError

try:
    ConfigLog("/invalid/path/to/file.txt")
except FileError as e:
    print(f"An error occurred: {e}")
```
